metadata.generator: Claude Code Opus 4.5 - Gap Analysis Phase A1

backlog.title: Create Synthex Dashboard Page
backlog.description: Create the main Synthex client dashboard at /synthex/dashboard with KPIs, recent activity feed, quick action buttons, and AI agent status indicators. This is the primary landing page after onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: Page renders with real workspace data
Shows KPIs: active projects, content pieces, SEO score, pending approvals
Recent activity feed displays last 10 agent actions
Quick action buttons work: Generate Content, Run SEO Audit, View Campaigns

backlog.title: Create Synthex Workspace Page
backlog.description: Create the AI workspace page at /synthex/workspace where users can interact with AI to generate content, run analyses, and manage tasks.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Campaigns Page
backlog.description: Create the campaigns management page at /synthex/campaigns for viewing, creating, and managing email and drip campaigns.
acceptance_criteria: List of campaigns with status indicators

backlog.title: Create Synthex SEO Reports Page
backlog.description: Create the SEO reports page at /synthex/seo showing audit results, keyword rankings, and optimization recommendations.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Content Library Page
backlog.description: Create the content library page at /synthex/content for managing generated content, drafts, and approved assets.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Analytics Page
backlog.description: Create the analytics dashboard at /synthex/analytics showing performance metrics across all channels.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Projects Page
backlog.description: Create the projects management page at /synthex/projects for organizing work by client or project.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Ideas Page
backlog.description: Create the ideas capture page at /synthex/ideas for brainstorming and planning content ideas.

backlog.title: Create Synthex Vault Page
backlog.description: Create the digital vault page at /synthex/vault for secure storage of brand assets and credentials.

backlog.title: Create Synthex AI Assistant Page
backlog.description: Create the AI assistant page at /synthex/assistant with a full chat interface for interacting with Claude.
acceptance_criteria: Ability to trigger agent actions from chat

backlog.title: Create Contact Page
backlog.description: Create the contact page at /contact with a form that submits to the contact API.
acceptance_criteria: Contact form with name, email, message

backlog.title: Create Blog Detail Route
backlog.description: Create dynamic blog post route at /blog/[slug] to display individual blog posts.

backlog.title: Create Forgot Password Page
backlog.description: Create the forgot password page at /forgot-password with password reset flow.
acceptance_criteria: Sends password reset email via Supabase

backlog.title: Verify Privacy, Terms, Cookies Pages
backlog.description: Verify that /privacy, /terms, and /cookies pages exist and contain appropriate content.

backlog.title: Post-Login Routing Based on Role
backlog.description: Implement role-based routing after login: CLIENT -> Synthex portal, FOUNDER/ADMIN -> Dashboard, new users -> onboarding.

backlog.title: Onboarding to Dashboard Flow
backlog.description: Ensure the onboarding completion redirects to a functional Synthex dashboard (not 404).
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding redirect goes to existing page
User lands with correct workspace context
Dashboard shows 'getting started' state for new users

backlog.title: Gmail Connection UI in Synthex
backlog.description: Add Gmail OAuth connection flow in Synthex portal settings or integrations page.

backlog.title: Content Generation from UI
backlog.description: Add ability to trigger content generation from Synthex workspace, with progress feedback and result display.

backlog.title: SEO Audit Trigger from UI
backlog.description: Add ability to run SEO audits on-demand from Synthex portal with results displayed in SEO page.
acceptance_criteria: Results displayed with score and recommendations

backlog.title: Agent Status Dashboard Widget
backlog.description: Create a dashboard widget showing real-time status of AI agents (running, idle, last run time, success rate).
acceptance_criteria: Widget shows agent list with status

backlog.title: Agent Activity Feed
backlog.description: Create a feed showing recent agent actions (emails processed, content generated, audits completed).

backlog.title: Create GMB Manager Skill
backlog.description: Create a new agent skill for managing Google Business Profile: posting updates, responding to reviews, managing photos.
acceptance_criteria: UI for GMB management in Synthex

backlog.title: Create Social Scheduler Skill
backlog.description: Create an agent skill for scheduling and posting content to social media platforms (Meta, LinkedIn, Twitter).

backlog.title: Email Campaign Runner Skill
backlog.description: Create an agent skill for executing email drip campaigns: send sequences, track opens/clicks, handle automation triggers.
acceptance_criteria: Handle automation triggers (new contact, score threshold)

backlog.title: Website Auditor Skill Enhancement
backlog.description: Enhance the SEO audit skill to be user-triggerable from UI with real-time progress and detailed results.

backlog.title: WebSocket Real-Time Updates
backlog.description: Implement WebSocket connection for real-time updates on agent status, content generation progress, and notifications.

backlog.title: Agent Scheduling System
backlog.description: Implement a scheduling system for automated agent runs (daily SEO checks, hourly email processing, weekly reports).

backlog.title: Replace Dashboard Vault Placeholder
backlog.description: Replace placeholder content in dashboard/vault/page.tsx with functional vault implementation.

backlog.title: Replace Dashboard Memory Placeholder
backlog.description: Replace placeholder content in dashboard/memory/page.tsx with functional memory/context viewer.

backlog.title: Replace Dashboard Marketplace Placeholder
backlog.description: Replace placeholder content in dashboard/marketplace/page.tsx or remove if not planned for MVP.

backlog.title: Replace Dashboard Campaigns Placeholder
backlog.description: Enhance dashboard/campaigns/page.tsx beyond placeholder to fully functional campaign management.

backlog.title: Replace Dashboard Brief Placeholder
backlog.description: Implement dashboard/brief/page.tsx for project briefs and creative requests.

backlog.title: Complete AIDO Pages
backlog.description: Complete the AIDO (AI Desktop Operator) pages that have TODO/placeholder content.
acceptance_criteria: Consistent UX with rest of dashboard

backlog.title: Dynamic Blog Content System
backlog.description: Implement a dynamic blog system with database-backed posts, categories, and CMS functionality.
